Title: Web Simplicity
Description:
Web Simplicity is an open source Website management system built on MS-SQL, Data Entities & MVC 3.

Features:
- CMS

Future 
- Forum
- Blog
- ECommerce
- User Controls
- Visual Theme Editor
- Google Integration
